name: TrickOrTreat - ANDROID - UNICAP 2022 - Match3 Game
description:
This is a Match3 game developed for Android during my university classes. The greatest challenge here was to make a grid system.

I did all the programming and my friend was the artist( see the credits section ).

Please, contact me if you are interested in having a look at the source code of this project.
